item.title: Teaching in the Savior’s Way
item.description:
Teaching in the Savior’s Way by undefined Jan E. Newman, Second Counselor in the Sunday School General Presidency given in Saturday Morning of 191st Annual General Conference on Wed Mar 31 2021
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Jan E. Newman, Second Counselor in the Sunday School General Presidency

item.title: Preserving the Voice of the Covenant People in the Rising Generation
item.description:
Preserving the Voice of the Covenant People in the Rising Generation by Brother Jan E. Newman, Second Counselor in the Sunday School General Presidency given in Saturday Afternoon of 193rd Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2023
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
